body.data:
UPDATE APP_SYSTEM_LOOKUPS
SET
  PLATFORM = {{ system_config.updatedRow.PLATFORM }},
  FORCE_UPDATE = {{ system_config.updatedRow.FORCE_UPDATE }},
  VERSION = {{ system_config.updatedRow.VERSION }},
  SUPPORT_PHONE = {{ system_config.updatedRow.SUPPORT_PHONE }},
  MASTER_OTP = {{ system_config.updatedRow.MASTER_OTP }},
  ACTIVE = {{ system_config.updatedRow.ACTIVE }},
  LAST_UPDATED_BY = {{ appsmith.user.name }},
  COMMENTS = {{ system_config.updatedRow.COMMENTS }},
  COUNTRY = {{ system_config.updatedRow.COUNTRY }},
  COUNTRY_CODE = {{ system_config.updatedRow.COUNTRY_CODE }},
  COMPANY_NAME = {{ system_config.updatedRow.COMPANY_NAME }},
  CREATED_AT = TO_DATE({{ system_config.updatedRow.CREATED_AT }}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
WHERE
  ID = {{ system_config.updatedRow.ID }}
